trans-unit.source: Represents the manifest of a SharePoint feature.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SharePoint 功能清单。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the feature is activated during installation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否在安装过程中激活该功能。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the feature is activated during installation; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> 如果在安装; 过程激活功能<see langword="false" />否则为。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of features on which activation of the current feature depends.
trans-unit.target: 获取激活当前功能所依赖的功能的列表。

trans-unit.source: A collection of objects representing the list of dependent features.
trans-unit.target: 表示相关功能的列表的对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the feature should be installed by force, even if the feature is already installed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否应强制安装该功能，即使该功能已安装。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the feature should be installed by force; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> 如果应强行; 安装该功能<see langword="false" />否则为。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the feature is activated by default for administrators.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否默认为管理员激活该功能。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the feature is activated by default; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> 如果默认情况下; 激活此功能<see langword="false" />否则为。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the developer who created the feature.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置创建该功能的开发人员的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the developer name.
trans-unit.target: 表示开发人员名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the central resource file for retrieving feature resources.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于检索功能资源的中央资源文件。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the name of the default resource file.
trans-unit.target: 表示默认资源文件的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a description of what the feature does.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该功能用途的说明。

trans-unit.source: A string representing a description.
trans-unit.target: 表示说明的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of feature element definition and support files.
trans-unit.target: 获取功能元素定义和支持文件的列表。

trans-unit.source: A collection of objects representing feature element definition and support files.
trans-unit.target: 表示功能元素定义和支持文件的对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SharePoint ID of the feature.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该功能的 SharePoint ID。

trans-unit.source: A GUID representing the feature ID.
trans-unit.target: 表示功能 ID 的 GUID

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets text for an image associated with the feature.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与该功能相关联的映像的文本。

trans-unit.source: A string representing image description text.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示图像说明文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the relative URL of the image associated with the feature.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与该功能相关联的映像的相对 URL。

trans-unit.source: A URL representing the Web location of the image
trans-unit.target: 表示图像的 Web 位置 URL

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the feature is visible in the list of available features to activate.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该功能在要激活的可用功能列表中是否可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if the feature is visible in the list; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> 如果的功能是出现在列表中;<see langword="false" />否则为。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of default values for feature properties.
trans-unit.target: 获取功能属性的默认值列表。

trans-unit.source: A collection of default feature property values.
trans-unit.target: 默认功能属性值的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the fully-qualified name of the assembly that contains the event receiver for the feature.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含该功能事件接收器的程序集的完全限定名称。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the fully-qualified name of an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 表示程序集的完全限定名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the class name of the event receiver for the feature.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该功能事件接收器的类名称。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the event receiver class name.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件接收器类名的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether SharePoint checks for resources for a particular language and culture.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 SharePoint 是否检查特定语言和区域性的资源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> if SharePoint checks for resources; <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> 如果 SharePoint 检查资源;<see langword="false" />否则为。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the context in which a feature is activated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置已激活某项功能的上下文。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the context in which the feature is activated.
trans-unit.target: 表示已激活该功能的上下文的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of the SharePoint server where the feature will be installed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置将安装该功能的 SharePoint 服务器的 ID。

trans-unit.source: This property is used for infrastructural purposes only and should not be used.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅用于基础结构，不应使用。

trans-unit.source: A GUID for the SharePoint server.
trans-unit.target: For SharePoint 服务器 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title of the feature, up to 255 characters.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置功能的标题，最多 255 个字符。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the feature title.
trans-unit.target: 表示功能标题的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that indicates the compatible version of the site.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指示站点的兼容版本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string representing a version.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个版本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of actions to execute when upgrading the current feature.
trans-unit.target: 获取升级当前功能时要执行的操作的列表。

trans-unit.source: A collection of objects representing actions to apply when upgrading the feature.
trans-unit.target: 表示应用升级功能时的操作的对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the fully-qualified name of the assembly that contains the feature event receiver handling custom upgrade actions.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含用于处理自定义升级操作的功能事件接收器的程序集的完全限定名称。

trans-unit.source: A string representing a fully-qualified assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个完全限定程序集名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the class name of the feature event receiver handling custom upgrade actions.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于处理自定义升级操作的功能事件接收器的类名称。

trans-unit.source: A string representing a feature event receiver class name.
trans-unit.target: 表示功能事件接收器类名的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see langword="System.Version" />-compliant representation of the version of the feature.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置符合 <see langword="System.Version" /> 的功能版本表示形式。

trans-unit.source: This value can be up to four numbers separated by decimals.
trans-unit.target: 此值最多可以有四个数字，由小数点分隔。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Version" /> value representing the version of the feature.
trans-unit.target: A<see langword="Version" />值，该值表示该功能的版本。
